column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Yesterday afternoon , I decided to ride my bike to Central Park .
#text=I rode my bike to the park from my apartment , it took me about 15 minutes .
#text=I was very excited and happy because I have n't rode my bike in a very long time .
#text=I missed the experience of feeling the window blowing against my face , and feeling my hair float in the air .
#text=When I finally got to the park , I decided that I would ride around the park a few times .
#text=It was going to be a great form of exercise .
#text=However , after I rode the bike a few times around the park , my front bicycle tire suddenly started to lose air .
#text=I safely got off and examined the tire wheel .
#text=I checked if there was any rips or holes on the wheel .
#text=I found a few small holes on the bike and realized the culprit for my flat tire .
#text=I was forced to carry the bike home in order to repair it .
#text=There was no way I would repair it at the park .
#text=Once I brought it home , I brought it to my basement .
#text=I turned the bike over so that it stood on its seat and handle bars .
#text=I let the remaining air out of the tube of my broken tire .
#text=Once the tire was deflated , I took the tire off the rim .
#text=I found the part of the tire with the multiple holes .
#text=I spread a thin layer of glue around the holes .
#text=Then I looked around for my tire patch kit .
#text=Once I found it , I applied it on to the holes and covered over them .
#text=I then placed the tire back on the rim and inflated it again .
